text: The 1980–81 Eintracht Frankfurt season was the 81st season in the club's football history. In 1980–81 the club played in the Bundesliga, the top tier of German football. It was the club's 18th season in the Bundesliga. The season ended up with Eintracht winning the DFB-Pokal for the third time. == Matches == ===Legend=== ===Friendlies=== ===Bundesliga=== ====League fixtures and results==== ====League table==== ===DFB-Pokal=== ====Final==== ===UEFA Cup=== ==Squad== ===Squad and statistics=== |} == Notes == ==References== ==Sources== * ==External links== * Official English Eintracht website * German archive site * 1980–81 Bundesliga season at Fussballdaten.de 1980-81 Category:German football clubs 1980–81 season
title: 1980–81 Eintracht Frankfurt season
